Paul Niehaus

  • about
  • research
  • entrepreneurship

GiveDirectly is the leading international NGO specialized in digital cash transfers to people living in extreme poverty. It works with leading impact philanthropists, corporate foundations, initiatives that reshape the way we fight poverty. It has consistently been rated one of the most impactful ways to give by GiveWell, among others. GiveDirectly has raised over $500M to date.

Segovia is a frontier markets enterprise payment platform, providing digital payment services across Africa to multinational corporations and NGOs. Its Series A was led by Reid Hoffman with participation from the Omidyar Network and the Global Innovation Fund, among others. Segovia was acquired in 2019 by Crown Agents Bank.

Taptap is an easy-to-use smartphone app that lets users send money home instantly with just a few taps and a debit card. Offering prices that are a fraction of the competition, Taptap has grown rapidly since its launch in 2018 to provide service across a large and expanding set of markets in Africa.
